warezcdn.name: Druaga No Tou
warezcdn.title: Doruâga no tô: The Aegis of Uruk

imdb.title: Doruâga no tô: The Aegis of Uruk
imdb.plot: A demon lord commands his forces from a tower. During the "Summer of Anu", they lose their power and human army invades the tower to end their threat. Adventurers who have heard about a priceless treasure hidden in the tower join ...

episodes.title: Jiru no bôken
episodes.plot: A brave young and clumsy shield master Jil is the latest member of a band of adventurers who are trying to reach the top of the Tower of Druaga and slay its dark lord. However, young Jil turns out to be somewhat of a burden, literally.

episodes.title: Doruâga no kyotô
episodes.plot: We get to see Jil's comically epic action-packed cliché-ridden dream.

episodes.title: Tônai toshi Mesukia
episodes.plot: Jil is thrown out of the group for gross incompetence, so he returns to the human city located at the base of the tower to form a new adventuring party. A female healer and a female warrior join up after his less than inspiring speech.

episodes.title: Tabidachi no mae ni
episodes.plot: Jil overhears his former party leader Neeba talking about a plan to assassinate the king who had just arrived with the army to climb the tower. Mistakenly believing that brave Neeba is in on the plot, Jil goes to stop him.

episodes.title: Bando obu bando
episodes.plot: Warrior lancer Ahmey and magic heeler Kaaya recruit Melt, a cowardly smug grumpy wizard, and his very young sweet smart and strong carrier and cook Coopa. They and Jil end up in jail as suspects for the assassination attempt.

episodes.title: Jiusudora no wana
episodes.plot: While climbing the tower, Jil and his new party arrive at the labyrinth of an ancient magician who loved practical jokes and left plenty of surprises for the unwary adventurers. However, his ultimate challenge will be the toughest.

episodes.title: Raikô no kakehashi
episodes.plot: The Gang helps an old adventurer who's looking for his long lost son. They arrive at another village in the tower. Coopa befriends a young thief who's trying to prove that his missing father is innocent of a theft.

episodes.title: Katahane to odore
episodes.plot: Jil and his party must convince other jaded adventurers and mercenaries to join them and the army in the fight against a giant ferocious dragon that killed Neeba's previous party and is now blocking the way up the tower.

episodes.title: Densetsu no tô
episodes.plot: In a tribute to The Tower of Druaga (1984) video game this show is based on, Kaaya manipulates Jil into entering the ruins of the former smaller Tower of Druaga to reach the prize at its top. Ahmey helps out by reading a walk-through.

episodes.title: Irebun nain
episodes.plot: After reaching the level where illusions can kill and everything is upside down, everyone gets separated and join up with lost members of the other parties. More is revealed about their individual reasons to climb the tower.

episodes.title: Natsu no owari ni
episodes.plot: Before reaching Druaga's lair itself, the parties must first negotiate a deadly ice desert. Of course, it's never that easy.

episodes.title: Tada ichimai no tate to shite
episodes.plot: Those that survived this far are finally faced with the monstrous Druaga itself. The only way out now is to kill it or die trying.

episodes.title: You Zapped to...
episodes.plot: After a treacherous climb marked by so much pain and sacrifice, Jil fights the battle of his life against Druaga. When the fight ends, a shocking discovery proves that, for some, the journey is only beginning.
